title: Major Life Announcement Revealed + Eddie Thinks He Saw Taylor Swift Driving + Lunchbox Hits The Streets for Drunk Trivia
itunes:title: Major Life Announcement Revealed + Eddie Thinks He Saw Taylor Swift Driving + Lunchbox Hits The Streets for Drunk Trivia
description:
Someone on the show reveals what their MAJOR life announcement is they’ve been waiting to share. Eddie was out driving yesterday and is convinced he saw Taylor Swift in a car behind him…we debate and investigate whether or not it was really her. Lunchbox hit the streets for Drunk Trivia and Bobby and Amy bet on whether the person will get the question right or wrong.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
